It's the compositing manager (meaning special effects...eyecandy) for Ubuntu.  It uses OpenGL aggressively and if you've got less than a mid-end card or higher, it's going to possibly feel laggy.
Try going to System->Preferences->Appearance in your menus on the desktop, it will bring up a pop-up with tabs.
